channel.title: Pictures
channel.description: how do i post pictures ... so if im relsing my server i will need pics thankx

item.title: Pictures
item.dc:creator: @dragonchain dragonchain
item.description:
@dragonchain wrote:

[quote=“Tyrael, post:2, topic:181795”]This doesn’t have to do with development/help. but

On your keyboard look for a key that says

“Prt scr” (Print screen)
click that and it will take a picture of your hole screen.
Then go to something like paint and click paste.
Then edit out what you don’t want.
Save. and go to imageshack.us, upload and use picture hotlink #1.

And copy paste that to the forums
-Tyrael-[/quote]Hes asking for help, this does have to do with help.

Read full topic

item.title: Pictures

item.description:
@Tyrael wrote:

This doesn’t have to do with development/help. but

On your keyboard look for a key that says

click that and it will take a picture of your hole screen.
Then go to something like paint and click paste.
Then edit out what you don’t want.
Save. and go to imageshack.us, upload and use picture hotlink #1.

And copy paste that to the forums
